A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a rule breaker. \nUnlike The Force Awakens\, it completely changes course of following a familiar framework and takes an unpredictable course. This obviously blew uncomfortable steam up elite star wars fans skirts\, but i'm undeterred in review in saying that is a movie that whilst being an entertaining space blockbuster\, it has a lot of compelling writing that needed to happen in the franchise.
